caption:
“Holiness is hidden in the hustle.”

Reflection:
Beneath deadlines and neon lights, grace hums softly, waiting to be noticed.

Commentary:
This reflection calls us to mindfulness in motion. The holy dwells not apart from our work, but within it.

#VeniFaithful #VeniPublishing #ModernPilgrim #GraceInTheGrind #WalkByFaith #EverydayFaith #PilgrimHeart #forwewalkbyfaithandnotbysight #ChristianInspiration #FaithQuotes
